body: I know how `ninja` works, I'm only saying that it will mostly benefit developers and not people who want to build PyTorch once, and it might be simpler to route everyone through the setuptools path by default since we know this works fairly well on all platforms (including Windows).
body_html: I know how ninja works, I'm only saying that it will mostly benefit developers and not people who want to build PyTorch once, and it might be simpler to route everyone through the setuptools path by default since we know this works fairly well on all platforms (including Windows).
